content: प्रस्तुत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Praised, eulogized. {@--2@} Begun, commenced. {@--3@} Accomplished, done, effected. {@--4@} Happened. {@--5@} Approached. {@--6@} Proposed, declared, under discussion, taken in hand. {@--7@} Expected, desired. {@--8@} Ready, prepared. {@--9@} Executed with effort or energy. {@--10@} Made or consisting of. --तं {@--1@} The matter in hand, the subject under discussion or consideration; अधुना प्रस्तुतमनुस्रियतां. {@--2@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Forming the subject of discussion, the उपमेय; see प्रकृत; अप्रस्तुतप्रशंसा सा या सैव प्रस्तुताश्रया <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
